alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 20 at 9:50AM MST until February 21 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Plummer, Potlatch, Genesee, Moscow, Pullman, La Crosse, Colfax, Rosalia, Tekoa, Uniontown, and Oakesdale. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles on north-south roads including Highway 195.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.
